sense.def:
The purpose of something
je razlog, zaradi katerega nekaj izdelamo ali storimo.

seg.quote: The purpose of the meeting was to discuss the committee's report.
The buildings are now used as a prison, but they weren't built for that purpose.

sense.def:
One's purpose
je tisto, kar nekdo želi doseči.

seg.quote: Her only purpose in life was to get rich.

sense.def:
Purpose
je občutek, da imamo pred seboj določen cilj, in odločenost, da ta cilj dosežemo.

seg.quote: She has given them a sense of purpose.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
on purpose
, tisto naredimo zato, ker tako hočemo.

seg.quote: He had gone there on purpose, to see what happened.

sense.def:
Izraz
for all practical purposes
pomeni, da položaj ni popolnoma tak, kot ga opisujemo, učinek pa je kljub temu enak.

seg.quote: The rest are now, for all practical purposes, useless.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo naredi nekaj
to no purpose
, s tistim ne doseže ničesar. Kadar nekdo naredi nekaj
to good purpose
, s tistim nekaj doseže.

seg.quote: He used his past experience to good purpose.
